items.content_html: A lightweight and customizable web GIS platform for the state of Goa, India. Designed as a community maintained tool for hyperlocal spatial data exploration and decision making.

items.title: thinakaranmanokaran/Package-Helper: A lightweight Node.js package published on NPM to simplify and automate common development tasks, designed for quick integration and ease of use.

items.content_html: MilkMate is a lightweight web application built for local milk vendors to simplify daily milk delivery tracking and customer payment management. Designed with React for the frontend and PHP + MySQL for the backend, MilkMate replaces paper records with a clean, digital interface.
items.title: Santhosh785/MilkMate: MilkMate is a lightweight web application built for local milk vendors to simplify daily milk delivery tracking and customer payment management. Designed with React for the frontend and PHP + MySQL for the backend, MilkMate replaces paper records with a clean, digital interface.

items.content_html: 🥭 A lightweight migration tool for Mongoose (MongoDB), inspired by Django's migration system.
items.title: moonlitgrace/mangoose-migrate: 🥭 A lightweight migration tool for Mongoose (MongoDB), inspired by Django's migration system.

items.content_html: Fluentity is a lightweight and flexible library for TypeScript/JavaScript applications to consume RESTFul API using models. It's inspired by Active Record and Laravel Eloquent. It provides a simple and intuitive way to interact with your API endpoints while maintaining type safety and following object-oriented principles.
items.title: cedricpierre/fluentity-core: Fluentity is a lightweight and flexible library for TypeScript/JavaScript applications to consume RESTFul API using models. It's inspired by Active Record and Laravel Eloquent. It provides a simple and intuitive way to interact with your API endpoints while maintaining type safety and following object-oriented principles.

items.content_html: Lightweight library that converts user-defined formulas into SQL or JavaScript.
items.title: laaane16/formulaParser: Lightweight library that converts user-defined formulas into SQL or JavaScript.

items.content_html: Eremos is a lightweight framework for deploying autonomous swarm agents that detect early on-chain activity across Solana.
items.title: EremosCore/Eremos: Eremos is a lightweight framework for deploying autonomous swarm agents that detect early on-chain activity across Solana.

items.content_html: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer — A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.
items.title: zeevarblocks/bitcoin-signal-analyzer: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer — A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.

items.content_html: HyCom API is a lightweight TypeScript client that simplifies access to the HyCom public API, allowing users to easily fetch authors, posts, and site statistics. 🚀 With its straightforward functions, you can quickly generate QR codes and explore popular tags without hassle. 🐙

items.content_html: This repository provides a fast and configurable gateway using Bun, designed to route HTTP requests to your microservices efficiently. With features like smart routing and built-in health checks, it simplifies local development and lightweight setups. 🐙🚀
items.title: ratul3429/bun-microservice-gateways: This repository provides a fast and configurable gateway using Bun, designed to route HTTP requests to your microservices efficiently. With features like smart routing and built-in health checks, it simplifies local development and lightweight setups. 🐙🚀

items.content_html: Sim Studio is an open-source AI agent workflow builder. Sim Studio's interface is a lightweight, intuitive way to quickly build and deploy LLMs that connect with your favorite tools.
